chargeHist.descr: Possess Firearm-Adjudicated Deliquent of a Felony

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Juan Angel Garibay

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Juan Angel Garibay in court.  Attorney Toni L. Young in court for Juan Angel Garibay.  Prosecuting attorney Drew Lehman in court for the State of Wisconsin. Clerk Dana A.  Minutes: ST called witness KPD Ofc Luke Hofmann; sworn in and testified; cross-examination by Atty Young. ST rested and moved for bind over; arguments heard. Probable cause found; bound over for trial. Information filed; reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.   Bond continued.
Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for January 26, 2022 at 09:00 am.

No time
Attorney Zachary Brost appeared for the State. Defendant appeared in custody. Clerk Dana A.  Minutes: Preliminary hearing and Arraignment scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 08:15 am. Bond continued as previously set. ec

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Return to sender. Not deliverable as addressed. Unable to forward. Notice of Assignment of Judge returned by post office.

Defendant Juan Angel Garibay in court, in custody by writ from RCJ.  Attorney Sydney Elizabeth Star appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
DE is eligible for SPD services, however, no atty has agreed to represent this applicant.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *No Weapons especially firearms.  No drug paraphenalia.

02:22 PM   Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Benjamin Schwarz.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days;   Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.. $5000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry). rb
and witness list filed by the State
